//question How to calculate my installment amount ? How to calculate the new market value ? How to calculate the estimated cash flow property ? How if I have a problem with this application ? If you have made the plan to take mortgage debt for the property you want to buy, you can calculate the amount of installments in this application. If you have calculated the number of installments, then the next step is calculating the market value. This value will calculate the price range of the propertyâ€™s market you want to buy. Usually, the Properties that are purchased primarily such as apartments, houses, or villas. Cash Flow can be calculated with this application. a. Click `Installment Calculator`.\nb. The `New Installment` dialog box will appear and fill in the installment details such as `Apartment`, click `Add`.\nc. Then fill in total mortgage loan, interest per annum (%), length of loan (month), fixed interest (month), and floating interest per year (%), click `Calculate`.\nd. It will appear automatically the results of `Time Principal Loans`, `Installment` and `Installment Floating`.\ne. Click the floppy mark in the top right corner to save the data. a. Click `Market Value Calculator`.\nb. Fill in all of required information from `Selling Price` to `Location Survey Note`, when you finish, click `Continue`.\nc. The page will be switched to the next section `Property # 1`, in this app you can add up to Listing # 5. Fill in all details of `Property Sales Price` to `Average Building Price Per Meter`.\nd. You Can click `back`, `Review` or `advanced` if you still want to calculate other properties.\ne. When you think it has been finished, click `Review`.\nf. A page will be appeared the new market value table data, click `Continue`.\ng. You will get `Final Result`.\nh. Click the floppy mark in the top right corner to save the data. a. Click `Cash Flow Calculator`.\nb. It will appear some pages like `Rooms`, `Entry`, `Expenses` and `Facility Upgrade`.\nc. Fill in all required information such as room type and amount of expenses.\nd. Next, fill in all parts of the page and the required information.\ne. Click `count` to get the result. Please, contact this email for your support : Cs@luckynineapps.com
